envelope.description: DSSE envelope specified as a stringified JSON object; payloadType in the envelope MUST be set to 'application/vnd.in-toto+json'

publicKeys.description: collection of all public keys used to verify signatures over envelope's payload

signatures.description: extracted collection of all signatures of the envelope's payload; elements will be sorted by lexicographical order of the base64 encoded signature strings

items.description: a signature of the envelope's payload along with the public key for the signature

signature.description: base64 encoded signature of the payload

publicKey.description: public key that was used to verify the corresponding signature

envelopeHash.description: Specifies the hash algorithm and value encompassing the entire envelope sent to Rekor

algorithm.description: The hashing function used to compute the hash value

value.description: The value of the computed digest over the entire envelope

payloadHash.description: Specifies the hash algorithm and value covering the payload within the DSSE envelope

algorithm.description: The hashing function used to compute the hash value

value.description: The value of the computed digest over the payload within the envelope
